text: "She Don't Know Me" is a 1984 song by American hard rock band Bon Jovi and taken from their debut studio album Bon Jovi. It went to number 48 in the United States. ==Track listings== US vinyl single * "She Don't Know Me" – 3:55 * "Burning for Love" – 3:52 UK vinyl, 7-inch single * "She Don't Know Me" * "Breakout" Category:1984 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Bon Jovi songs
title: She Don't Know Me
